about_the_game:
Sam, stop Tom. If we don't, the world will perish.

Synopsis

The two have been childhood friends since elementary school. The two went to the same school in junior high and high school, and recognized each other as best friends.

In the summer of his second year of college, Tom dropped out. Due to family circumstances, Tom had to work. From then on, we gradually passed each other……

Later, Sam started his own business right after graduating from university and made a fortune with a social media app. He was living a smooth life until he realized, ``Even though I created an app that anyone could connect with, I still haven't met the person I really want to meet,'' so he decides to go see Tom on his birthday.

But Sam didn't notice. Tom isn't the Tom he was back then……

Third-person action battle

This work is an action battle game from a third-person perspective. Toms with different attack patterns will appear in each stage and will stand in your way. Observe Tom's movements carefully and find an opening to attack.

Conquer stages full of gimmicks

There are some places where you can't fight Tom unless you conquer the stage. Move Sam well and clear the labyrinth stages and falling stages.

A tense battle

Sam isn't a superhero in the comics, he's just a company president. Therefore, there is no way to recover HP, and you cannot continue. Break through the approaching Tom while maintaining your limited HP.

Time attack function

This game allows you to check the current time while playing the game. Play over and over and beat Tom the fastest to set a personal record.
